price: उन्होंने कहा : तुम मेरे साथ हरगिज़ धैर्य न रख सकोगे।
arabic: قَالَ إِنَّكَ لَن تَسۡتَطِيعَ مَعِيَ صَبۡرٗا

version.title: Hindi Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indian by Azizul-Haqq Al-Umary.

meta.transliteration: qāla innaka lan tastaṭīʿa maʿiya ṣabran
